ing: 3 large kohlrabi bulbs, peeled and grated
4 cups chicken broth, or as needed to cover
1 teaspoon white sugar, or to taste
1 pinch Hungarian paprika, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon prepared horseradish, or to taste (optional)
des: "This is an old-world approach to soup. It is an excellent comfort food. My grandmother used to add egg dumplings to the soup, but that is optional."
ins: Combine kohlrabi, cabbage, carrots, red bell peppers, green bell peppers, green beans, and parsley in a stockpot. Pour enough chicken broth over the vegetables to cover; bring to a simmer over medium heat and cook until vegetables are tender, about 20 minutes. Season with sugar, paprika, salt, and black pepper. Top with sour cream and horseradish.
